subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: On Friday, an opponent’s unplayable lie proved Stacy Lewis’s undoing. On Saturday, she stayed vigilant and, with Paula Creamer, won a match for her first points of the week.
snippet: On Friday, an opponent’s unplayable lie proved Stacy Lewis’s undoing. On Saturday, she stayed vigilant and, with Paula Creamer, won a match for her first points of the week.
